subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Box's. Vintage Shortwave Panasonic am/fm radio with manual dial sweep

Yeah, poor Laura has to deal with NO Hable Ingles!!  She is a real trooper!  She still is getting good communication no matter what!!!!
   
  Juli

Laura Kimberley <gjk1rrfan@...> wrote:
              Hi Mike,
  Yes I have 2 of those and they still work great! , Being in America you should do well good Luck!
  
  LK
  
  
      From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of Michael Edwards
Sent: Friday, February 29, 2008 9:49 PM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Box's. Vintage Shortwave Panasonic am/fm radio with manual dial sweep


  
          Thanks.  So it is shortwave am/fm, and you need to be able to sweep. I have an old panasonic shortwave am/fm radio that was my dad's. It still works and it has the manual sweep with the dial. I wonder if that would work.  Have any of you tried one of these. See attached file.

    

    Mike Edwards Cary, NC
